coreAttributes.name: Boxer Briefs
coreAttributes.description: A pair of snug fitting men's underwear.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the boxer briefs, before pulling them up to cover [npc.her] private parts.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the boxer briefs, before pulling them up to cover [npc2.her] private parts.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(forces)] [npc2.name] to step into the boxer briefs, before roughly yanking them up to cover [npc2.her] private parts.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc.her] boxer briefs, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] boxer briefs, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] grab a hold of and roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] boxer briefs, before yanking them off.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the fly closed on [npc.her] boxer briefs.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the fly closed on [npc2.namePos] boxer briefs.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] grab a hold of [npc2.namePos] boxer briefs before rougly [npc.verb(pulling)] the fly closed.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pulls)] open the fly on [npc.her] boxer briefs.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pulls)] open the fly on [npc2.namePos] boxer briefs.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] grabs a hold of [npc2.namePos] boxer briefs before rougly [npc.verb(pulling)] open the fly.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the back of [npc.her] boxer briefs.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the back of [npc2.namePos] boxer briefs.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] the back of [npc2.namePos] boxer briefs, roughly yanking them back up.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the back of [npc.her] boxer briefs. Exposing [npc.her] [npc.assSize] ass to the cold air.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the back of [npc2.namePos] boxer briefs. Exposing [npc2.her] [npc2.assSize] ass to the cold air.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] the back of [npc2.namePos] boxer briefs, roughly yanking them down. Exposing [npc2.her] [npc2.assSize] ass to the cold air.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] the waistband of [npc2.namePos] boxer briefs, roughly yanking them back up.

displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] the waistband of [npc2.namePos] boxer briefs, roughly yanking them down.
